44bb0b77-9b73-4497-9a4c-1256e20e11d3.name: 期待陪伴
44bb0b77-9b73-4497-9a4c-1256e20e11d3.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

1b9560a5-4e2d-414b-a9f8-c5994f994890.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
1b9560a5-4e2d-414b-a9f8-c5994f994890.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

fecf1950-adfb-4138-8fcd-9c038515e8b6.name: 执念
fecf1950-adfb-4138-8fcd-9c038515e8b6.notes: Become the best  swordsman in the world!

12cd5049-51d2-4ac3-ad40-d4ac48e3f77c.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)

442d040d-e69d-4b63-9c65-f2c33c2fad01.name: 幸运
442d040d-e69d-4b63-9c65-f2c33c2fad01.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

373e314c-ba3e-4388-8d64-c68fe902f118.name: Talent (Seafarer)
373e314c-ba3e-4388-8d64-c68fe902f118.notes: And adds to Carousing and Streetwise rolls made in port towns.

b0306086-1071-45dd-bf26-1609a94bc52d.name: Reaction Bonus
b0306086-1071-45dd-bf26-1609a94bc52d.notes: Sailors, pirates, and aquatic races sympathetic to sea travel

f91d0dc8-77aa-4d90-9391-c66e92bb423c.name: 可选增益
f91d0dc8-77aa-4d90-9391-c66e92bb423c.notes: Bonus to resist seasicknes and reduce unfamiliarity penalties for system on an appropriate boat or ship. Bonus to Carousing and Streetwise in port towns.

f32b431c-9c39-45f1-aa98-c51d7539b1ce.name: Weapon Bond
f32b431c-9c39-45f1-aa98-c51d7539b1ce.notes: +1 to effective skill when using @a specific weapon@

b95a6e4e-8e32-4cce-96db-ed0bb5348317.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

f2065d53-d511-4f22-ab65-ee3f8ebd1b3d.name: 战斗反射
f2065d53-d511-4f22-ab65-ee3f8ebd1b3d.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

913eef22-60bc-42c0-9435-cabae00f06c6.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

8e433e62-6071-42b3-9284-dc946b51ad28.name: 高痛阈
8e433e62-6071-42b3-9284-dc946b51ad28.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

01119ea6-ba79-4cfb-aa34-76e39b934957.name: Luck, Extraordinary
01119ea6-ba79-4cfb-aa34-76e39b934957.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

348467a8-57c2-4fea-ae28-679b02db42c8.name: 标志性装备
348467a8-57c2-4fea-ae28-679b02db42c8.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

80f9e5a9-925b-4e86-a55c-0dfc9b1f3522.name: Talent (Seafarer)
80f9e5a9-925b-4e86-a55c-0dfc9b1f3522.notes: And adds to Carousing and Streetwise rolls made in port towns.

74392c39-5575-4160-8bb3-a1c53236bbd8.name: Reaction Bonus
74392c39-5575-4160-8bb3-a1c53236bbd8.notes: Sailors, pirates, and aquatic races sympathetic to sea travel

7ee8d6aa-57c8-4be0-adc8-d1d1c65c88ef.name: 可选增益
7ee8d6aa-57c8-4be0-adc8-d1d1c65c88ef.notes: Bonus to resist seasicknes and reduce unfamiliarity penalties for system on an appropriate boat or ship. Bonus to Carousing and Streetwise in port towns.

3e2f5c6d-37b5-47b7-add3-454d1e69eeec.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

ae9a1efe-d84e-4f6b-b5b0-d47899f31fcb.name: Or 1 point to raise one of those skills or any one-point primary or secondary skill by a level.
